rows.label: qst105301_msg001
rows.name: Placeholder implementation

rows.label: qst105301_msg002
rows.name:
We plan to station soldiers at
the Genbu Crown, but the timing
is bad for us to go alone.

rows.label: qst105301_msg003
rows.name:
The enemies in the Genbu Great Snowfield
have entered their breeding season and
are becoming aggressive and violent.

rows.label: qst105301_msg004
rows.name:
Every year we form a squad to subjugate
them, but this year Zeke-sama is here.
Please lend us your strength.

rows.label: qst105301_msg005
rows.name:
The Snow-Mountain Carnivores are
rampaging in the Genbu Great
Snowfield. Please subjugate them.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh... It is His Highness
and his companions.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0002
rows.name:
We are actually facing a bit
of a difficult situation...

rows.label: qst105301_msg0003
rows.name:
The Genbu Crown is the most important
place for this country, but...

rows.label: qst105301_msg0004
rows.name:
...because we had no interaction with
the outside world, no one set foot
there, so it was left unguarded.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0005
rows.name:
However, during the recent
turmoil, we allowed foreign
enemies to invade...

rows.label: qst105301_msg0006
rows.name:
To ensure such a thing never
happens again, we have decided
to station troops there.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0007
rows.name:
However... the timing is poor
for sending our troops.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0008
rows.name:
The BQ1053 Snow-Mountain Carnivores that
inhabit the Hallowed War-Grounds have
gathered for their breeding season.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0009
rows.name:
Perhaps due to the effects of rising from the
Cloud Sea, they are more aggressive than
usual, and our troops can't handle them...

rows.label: qst105301_msg0010
rows.name:
We cannot wait until they calm
down, so we were at a loss.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0011
rows.name: Will you really? Thank you!

rows.label: qst105301_msg0012
rows.name:
With His Highness and his
companions, we can entrust
this to you with peace of mind.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0013
rows.name:
Let's see... If you could defeat
about 10 of them, our troops
should be able to advance.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0014
rows.name: Please be careful.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0101
rows.name:
The targets are the BQ1053
Snow-Mountain Carnivores that
inhabit the Hallowed War-Grounds.

rows.label: qst105301_msg0102
rows.name: Please be careful.
